definition[0]: films, programmes, books etc that are badly made or badly written, are intended for entertainment only, and have no serious value
example[0]: Hollywood produces a lot of pap.
definition[1]: very soft food that does not have a strong taste, like the food that babies eat
definition[2]: if a famous person is papped, one of the paparazzi takes a photograph of them without asking them, for a newspaper or magazine
example[1]: The singer was papped coming out of a nightclub.
